name: Maid Cafe Massacre
description:
Maid Cafe Massacre:

You go into a maid cafe and you find the girls there so attractive that you can't help but murder the lot of them. This is my first ever game and the concept is taken from the song of the same name by my band Penetrated as a way to help promote the new album Kaiju Cockfight being released in late 2022.  

Controls:

WASD - movement

L/Shift - Sprint

Space - Jump

L/Mouse Click - Shoot

F1 - Main Menu

Esc - Quit Game
